divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and I were out in the country, where it is darker, to get a better view of the comet that was visible in the north west about eight to ten years ago. I looked around the sky and found the ursa major and noticed a moving 'star' then another and another and another. 4 in a row moving south south east. Nevertheless, I thought they were sattelites. But, as I watched the last two made and instant ninety degree course change and began moving West south west. I don't know if sattelites can make a course change so I thought I'd let you know about it. Your web page will not allow me to say that This was in Alberta Canada. In order to report this I had to say I was in Alaska USA
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Anchorage
There were no other sightings in Anchorage on or around October 15th 1998
